options.content:
* Deployment = Vanilla k8s Deployment
* Activator = Always hook the activator in
* Queue = Only hook the activator in when scaled to zero.

targets.query: _measurement: "Knative Serving dataplane probe" AND tags.BUILD_ID:$buildid AND tags.JOB_NAME:$jobname

options.content:
* Zero = Only hook the activator in at zero
* Always = Always hook the activator in.
* 200 = Hook the activator in until we reach 200 concurrent requests

options.content:
* Activator Direct = Always hook the activator in: weightedExponential
* Activator Direct Lin = Always hook the activator in: linear
* Queue = Only hook the activator in when scaled to zero.
